item.title: Service Configuration
item.description: Environment Variables Name Type Default Value Description PROXY_DEBUG_ADDR string 127.0.0.1:9205 PROXY_DEBUG_TOKEN string PROXY_DEBUG_PPROF bool false PROXY_DEBUG_ZPAGES bool false PROXY_HTTP_ADDR string 0.0.0.0:9200 PROXY_HTTP_ROOT string / PROXY_TRANSPORT_TLS_CERT string ~/.ocis/proxy/server.crt PROXY_TRANSPORT_TLS_KEY string ~/.ocis/proxy/server.key PROXY_TLS bool true REVA_GATEWAY string 127.
